SummaryEnglish: Brothers Lucifer, Mammon, Leviathan, Satan, Asmodeus, Beelzebub, and Belphegor are among the most powerful demons in the Devildom, serving as officers on the student council at the Royal Academy of Diavolo (RAD). However, being avatars of the seven deadly sins, their behaviors often tend toward the extreme. Their everyday antics belie their high status and fearsome reputations among others of their kind. When viewed behind the scenes, the members of this family are more lovable—and laughable—than they first seem!
Aliases: Obey Me! One master to rule them all!

1.SummaryEnglish: Fearful of what their recent test results could mean for them at the Royal Academy of Diavolo, the eldest of the seven brothers, Lucifer, sits his brothers down for a much-needed family study group to up their average. However, when his brothers struggle to focus and get any study done, Lucifer must take drastic measures to stop them from slacking off.

2.SummaryEnglish: Alone in his room, third-born Leviathan lets his inner cosplayer loose as he puts on a one-man show dressed as his favorite character Ruri Hana from "The Magical Ruri Hana: Demon Girl." However, when his younger brothers have little care for boundaries, Leviathan must hide his cosplay as sixth-born Beelzebub and seven-born Belphegor come unexpectedly barging in.

3.SummaryEnglish: Welcome to the bunny boy café in which the brothers dress up as bunnies! If you find a bunny you like, please give him a carrot. The brothers will do their best serving you to earn a carrot. Please enjoy your time and relax. Oh? Your time is up with the bunny boys! You have one carrot left... Which bunny will get your very last carrot?

4.SummaryEnglish: The brothers are at the private beach of Lord Diavolo, the only son of the Demon King (Levi isn't much of an outdoor type so he is absent). The ever-so-poor Mammon secretly tries to carry out his plan, which is to take a shirtless photo of Lucifer and sell it to Lucifer's fans at RAD. However, his opponent is a tough one! With no openings, there are no photo opportunities. Mammon has had it and comes up with a final plan. Will he succeed...?

5.TitleEnglish: Princess Asmodeus Is in Another Castle
5.SummaryEnglish: In a desolate land oddly reminiscent of a JRPG, the final boss Beelzebub sits upon a throne with his captive, Princess Asmo, by his side. To save the princess, three adventurers, Leviathan the Hero, Satan the Warrior, and Belphegor the Mage, confront Beelzebub. But when the mighty Leviathan slays Beelzebub with one swing, the adventurers don't receive the reaction they were expecting.

6.SummaryEnglish: It seems as if Satan has been reading too many detective novels. Springing into action, Detective Satan begins solving mysteries left, right and center — that is until catching the perpetrator of one crime proves nearly unthinkable.

7.TitleEnglish: Obey Me! The Anime Audio Commentary
7.SummaryEnglish: The voice actors watch previous anime episodes and provide commentary.

8.TitleEnglish: A Dog by Any Other Name
8.SummaryEnglish: Mammon finds the "Forbidden Book of Body Switching" and plans to use it for some mischief, but when a dog interferes Mammon is certain everyone in the house will make fun of the results. However, the opposite happens?

9.TitleEnglish: The First Great Sibling Psychological War
9.SummaryEnglish: Beelzebub, Belphegor, and Asmodeus are exercising in the library of the house when disaster strikes. Fearing Lucifer's anger, each of the three try using any excuse they can think of to avoid being the one to tell Lucifer what happened.

12.TitleEnglish: Silent Night: A Brotherless New Year's Eve

1.SummaryEnglish: The demon brothers are finally back! But they're missing a certain somebody... In order to keep their minds occupied, the brothers use a variety of wacky tactics. All the while, Mammon is scheming in the background.

3.TitleEnglish: The Long Awaited Ruri-chan Viewing Party
3.SummaryEnglish: Leviathan holds a viewing party of Ruri-chan's latest movie!

4.SummaryEnglish: Detective Satan dons his trench coat once again and searches for the next big mystery!

5.SummaryEnglish: Solomon test plays Asmodeus's custom-made game "Asmodeus Academy." During his playthrough, Solomon encounters some unique characters as he attempts to find the murderer in this school-themed mystery-suspense game

7.TitleEnglish: Obey Me! The Anime Season 2 Audio Commentary
7.SummaryEnglish: The cast looks back on the episodes up until now in a humorous audio commentary! You'll be privy to some never heard before information about the anime and more! A new type of audio commentary!

10.TitleEnglish: Play Ball! The All-Demon Baseball Game

11.SummaryEnglish: To celebrate their appearance in Season 2, Diavolo, Barbatos, Luke, Simeon, and Solomon have a closing party! They recount what has unfolded up to this point when they come to a sudden realization.
